channel.title: Articles on Sobremesa en Milliways
channel.description: Recent content in Articles on Sobremesa en Milliways

item.title: 18.03 Differential Equations - First Order Differential Equations
item.author: pablo.palazon@gmail.com (Pablo Palazon)
item.description:
• 1 Unit I: Differential Equation - ODE
    • 1.1 DONE Basic DE's and Separable Equations
    • 1.2 DONE Geometric Methods
    • 1.3 DONE Numerical Methods
    • 1.4 NEXT Review Practice Problems and Problems Part II - Geometric Methods
    • 1.5 DONE First Order Linear ODE's
    • 1.6 NEXT Review Linear models problems
    • 1.7 DONE Solution by Integrating Factors
    • 1.8 DONE Complex Arithmetic and Exponentials
    • 1.9 DONE Sinusoidal Functions
    • 1.10 DONE First Order Constant Coefficient Linear ODE's
    • 1.11 DONE Exponential Input; Gain and Phase Lag
    • 1.12 DONE First Order Autonomous Differential Equations
    • 1.13 DONE Linear vs. Nonlinear
  • 2 Anki Cards - First Order Differential Equations:diffeqn:calculus:ode:

In this session we will introduce our most important differential equation and its solution: \(y’ = ky\). This DE models exponential growth or decay.

We will also learn how to solve what are called separable equations. Finally, we will see first-order linear models of several physical processes.
